diff_act: 2.present the last reported known values with report time

regen.absent_element: report time of last known AV status values during Loss of Link
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall display the report time of the last known AV status values when presenting them during Loss of Link.

regen.absent_element: report time when presenting the last known AV status values during Loss of Link
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall present the last reported known AV status values with report time when the data link is interrupted.

regen.absent_element: report time for estimated AV position during Loss of Link
regen.new_specification: The system shall display the report time along with the estimated AV position during Loss of Link.

label: When the data link is interrupted, the TCS also shall present the time at which the last AV status values were reported
absence: action of presenting the time at which the last AV status
